backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, referenced files, components, and associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading main React bundle and Playfair Display font with site metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with layout and routes for Home, Books, and About pages.
frontend/src/components/SafeImage.tsx: Image component that swaps to a fallback source on load error.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer displaying copyright text and a Caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with navigation links and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Centralized site content including hero text, book data, and about-page assets.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using identity changes and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook managing login state and identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for future React Query hooks for backend interaction.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and applies base typography and layout styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page showing an author portrait, biography text, and optional highlights from siteContent.
frontend/src/pages/BooksPage.tsx: Displays a list of books with cover images, status badges, blurbs, and optional extended descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Defines the homepage with a hero section and a featured books section using data from siteContent.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins, mapping CSS variables to theme values.
project_state.json: Tracks project requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for the author website build.
